paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.658_659delGT, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The female proband was diagnosed with unilateral breast cancer at the age of 36 years.

functional_data.summary: The frameshift mutation is a loss-of-function variant in the BRCA2 gene.

variants.segregation_data: The mother was unaffected and carried the BRCA1 variant but not the BRCA2 variant.
variants.additional_notes: The variant has been described in numerous patients with BRCA2-associated cancers.
key_quotes: The frameshift mutation c.658_659delGT (p.(Val220Ilefs*4)) is a loss-of-function variant in the BRCA2 gene.
Both variants were classified as pathogenic according to the abovementioned data.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extraction was straightforward with clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
